name: Heal
description: Pow: 10, A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers an ally's HP.

name: Mend
description: Pow: 20, A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers a great deal of an ally's HP.

name: Physic
description: Pow: 8, A staff imbued with healing magic. Can recover an ally's HP at a distance.

name: Recover
description: Pow: 40, A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers vast amounts of an ally's HP.

name: Fortify
description: Pow: 7, A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers HP for all allies within a 5-space radius.

name: Restore
description: A staff that removes status effects on an ally.

name: Warp
description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports an adjacent ally up to 5 spaces away.

name: Rewarp
description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports the user up to 5 spaces away.

name: Rescue
description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports a faraway ally to an adjacent space.

name: Entrap
description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports a faraway foe to an adjacent space.

name: Illume
description: A staff that magically shines through darkness. Illuminates a 7-space radius (shrinks one space per turn).

name: Freeze
description: A staff that prevents foes from moving for 1 turn.

name: Silence
description: A staff that prevents foes from using tomes or staves for 1 turn.

name: Obstruct
description: A staff that conjures a mass of ice that makes one space impassable for 1 turn.

name: Fracture
description: A staff imbued with magic that can break foes.

name: Nodus
description: Pow: 20, A staff imbued with mysterious magic that sets all allies' engage meters to max.

name: Treat
description: Pow: 15, A staff with a sweet scent. Recovers an ally's HP.

name: Recover
description: Pow: 40, Staff wielded by Emblem Celica. Recovers a great deal of HP.

name: Fortify+
description: Pow: 10, A staff wielded by Emblem Veronica. Heals HP and status effects for all allies within a 7-space radius.

name: Reflect
description: Staff of Emblem Soren. Allies within 2 spaces gain "deals 50% of magic damage taken back to foe" for 1 turn.
